long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Voice Transcription is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly record short voice messsages and obtain high-quality transcriptions in seconds. Perfect for students, professionals, journalists, and anyone who needs accurate and quick voice-to-text conversion.

Simple to Use: Click to start recording your voice and click again to stop. It’s that easy!
- Receive your transcriptions almost instantly after you stop recording.
- Powered by advanced speech-to-text technology to ensure high accuracy.
- View your transcription in a scrollable area and copy it to your clipboard with a single click.
Secure: Your recordings and transcriptions are processed securely and not being stored.

You can download SpeakApp AI from the App Store for iOS devices to record and transcribe voice to text.
